languages.text: "Во время великой чистки, которой праведники подвергли Фолстоун, было выявлено гнездо недолюдей-вырожденцев. Настоятель лично возглавил очищение, получил тяжелую рану и скончался спустя планетарный оборот. На смертном одре он обрел видение, в котором святой Когнаций воплощался в теле из своих святых реликвий".

"During the great purge conducted by the righteous of Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next planetary turn. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from the saint's holy relics."
languages.original_text: "Во время великой чистки, которой праведники подвергли Фолстоун, было выявлено гнездо недолюдей-вырожденцев. Настоятель лично возглавил очищение, получил тяжелую рану и скончался спустя планетарный оборот. На смертном одре он обрел видение, в котором святой Когнаций воплощался в теле из своих святых реликвий".

traits.locale_text: "During the great purge that the righteous conducted on Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next day. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from his holy relics."

languages.text: «Durante la gran purga de Rocainmunda por parte de los justos, se descubrió una guarida de degenerados subhumanos. El prelado dirigió personalmente la purga, sufrió una herida grave y murió durante la siguiente rotación planetaria. En su lecho de muerte, recibió una visión en la que san Cognatius se reencarnaba en un cuerpo hecho de las reliquias del santo».
languages.original_text: "During the great purge conducted by the righteous of Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next planetary turn. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from the saint's holy relics."

traits.locale_text: «Durante la gran purga de Rocainmunda por parte de los justos, se descubrió una guarida de degenerados subhumanos. El prelado dirigió personalmente la purga, sufrió una herida grave y murió durante la siguiente rotación planetaria. En su lecho de muerte, recibió una visión en la que san Cognatius se reencarnaba en un cuerpo hecho de las reliquias del santo».

languages.text: « Au cours de la grande épuration, les justes de Rochepeste ont mis au jour un repaire de sous-hommes dégénérés. Le prélat, qui menait personnellement les purges, a subi une grave blessure qui l'a emporté le tour planétaire suivant. Sur son lit de mort, il a reçu une vision de Saint Cognatius, réincarné dans une enveloppe charnelle constituée de ses reliques consacrées. »
languages.original_text: "During the great purge conducted by the righteous of Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next planetary turn. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from the saint's holy relics."

traits.locale_text: « Au cours de la grande épuration, les justes de Rochepeste ont mis au jour un repaire de sous-hommes dégénérés. Le prélat, qui menait personnellement les purges, a subi une grave blessure qui l’a emporté le tour planétaire suivant. Sur son lit de mort, il a reçu une vision de Saint Cognatius, réincarné dans une enveloppe charnelle constituée de ses reliques consacrées. »

languages.text: “荒寂岩地的正义之人发起的大清洗。在大清洗期间，信徒们发现了某个劣等亚人类的巢穴。教长大人身先士卒冲了进去，但受了重伤，没能熬过那个行星巡。临终之时，他看到了异象——圣科尼亚蒂乌斯转世到了其圣遗物制成的躯体之中。”
languages.original_text: "During the great purge conducted by the righteous of Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next planetary turn. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from the saint's holy relics."

traits.locale_text: “荒寂岩地的正义之人发起的大清洗。在大清洗期间，信徒们发现了某个劣等亚人类的巢穴。教长大人身先士卒冲了进去，但受了重伤，没能熬过那个行星巡。临终之时，他看到了异象——圣科尼亚蒂乌斯转世到了其圣遗物制成的躯体之中。”

languages.text: 「ファウルストーンの正しき魂が行った大粛清の最中に、亜人の異常者の巣窟が摘発された。その粛清を指揮した上級聖職者は重傷を負い、次の惑星周期において死亡した。死の床で、彼は聖コグナティウスが聖人の聖遺物から作られた体に転生する幻を見たといいます」
languages.original_text: "During the great purge conducted by the righteous of Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next planetary turn. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from the saint's holy relics."

traits.locale_text: 「ファウルストーンの正しき魂が行った大粛清の最中に、亜人の異常者の巣窟が摘発された。その粛清を指揮した上級聖職者は重傷を負い、次の惑星周期において死亡した。死の床で、彼は聖コグナティウスが聖人の聖遺物から作られた体に転生する幻を見たといいます」

languages.text: "Während der großen Säuberung durch die Rechtschaffenen von Foulstone wurde ein Versteck untermenschlicher Abtrünniger entdeckt. Der Prälat führte die Säuberung persönlich an, wurde schwer verwundet und starb in der nächsten Planetenrotation. Auf dem Totenbett wurde er mit einer Vision gesegnet, in der St. Cognatius wiedergeboren wurde, in einem Körper aus den Reliquien des Heiligen."
languages.original_text: "During the great purge conducted by the righteous of Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next planetary turn. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from the saint's holy relics."

traits.locale_text: "Während der großen Säuberung durch die Rechtschaffenen von Foulstone wurde ein Versteck untermenschlicher Abtrünniger entdeckt. Der Prälat führte die Säuberung persönlich an, wurde schwer verwundet und starb in der nächsten Planetenrotation. Auf dem Totenbett wurde er mit einer Vision gesegnet, in der St. Cognatius wiedergeboren wurde, in einem Körper aus den Reliquien des Heiligen."

languages.text: "Erdemli Menfurtaş tarafından düzenlenen büyük arındırma esnasında sapkın mutantlarla dolu bir in ortaya çıkarılmış. Arındırmaya bizzat önderlik eden piskopos, ölümcül bir yara alarak gezegenin bir sonraki dönüşünde vefat etmiş. Ölüm döşeğindeyken kendisine bir görü bahşedilmiş. Bu görüde Aziz Cognatius'un azizin kutsal yadigârlarından yapılma bir bedende dirildiğini görmüş."
languages.original_text: "During the great purge conducted by the righteous of Foulstone, a den of subhuman deviants was uncovered. The prelate personally led the purge, sustained a grievous wound, and died the next planetary turn. On his deathbed, he was granted a vision where Saint Cognatius was reincarnated in a body made from the saint's holy relics."
